variable.name: subj_id
variable.description: Deidentified Subject ID

variable.name: protocol
variable.description: Protocol - Study name

variable.name: visit_reference
variable.description: This is the reference to the visit in the study

variable.name: visit_month
variable.description: Number of months in relation to Baseline visit

variable.name: visit_week
variable.description: Number of weeks in relation to Baseline visit

variable.name: case_control
variable.description: Affection status

variable.name: case_control_peak
variable.description: Affection status in PEAK
variable.comment: PEAK has less strict affection status criteria.

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: race
variable.description: Race of participant

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age at follow-up visit

variable.name: htcm
variable.description: Standing height at follow-up visit

variable.name: wtkg
variable.description: Weight at follow-up visit

variable.name: bmi
variable.description: BMI at follow-up visit

variable.name: bmiz
variable.description: BMIZ at follow-up visit

variable.name: tanner_stage
variable.description: Tanner Stage at follow-up visit

variable.name: tx_grp_fup
variable.description: Treatment group at follow-up visit
variable.comment: Treatment group in CAMP is assigned at baseline and stays the same until the termination of the study.

variable.name: run_in_tx
variable.description: Run-In Treatment group at follow-up visit

variable.name: saba_tx_fup
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at follow-up visit was SABA (Short acting B-agonist) arm
variable.comment: Treatment group in CAMP is assigned at baseline and stays the same until the termination of the study.

variable.name: laba_tx_fup
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at follow-up was LABA (Long acting B-agonist) arm
variable.comment: Treatment group in CAMP is assigned at baseline and stays the same until the termination of the study.

variable.name: cs_tx_fup
variable.description: Treatment group assigned at follow-up was steroid arm
variable.comment: Treatment group in CAMP is assigned at baseline and stays the same until the termination of the study.

variable.name: cs_dose_fup
variable.description: Corticosteroid dose

variable.name: cs_comb_tx_fup
variable.description: Participant assigned to Combination Therapy Group (Steroid Treatment + other)
variable.comment: Treatment group in CAMP is assigned at baseline and stays the same until the termination of the study.

variable.name: bursts
variable.description: Number of prednisone bursts since last visit

variable.name: edhos
variable.description: Number of ER visit or hospitalizations since last visit

variable.name: prech
variable.description: Change in FEV1 at follow-up visit from Baseline

variable.name: prechpp
variable.description: Change in FEV1 percent predicted at follow-up visit from Baseline

variable.name: eno
variable.description: Exhaled nitric oxide at follow-up visit
variable.comment: CAMP did not record exhaled nitric oxide (eno)

variable.name: pc20
variable.description: FEV1 PC20 methacholine at follow-up visit

variable.name: lnpc20
variable.description: Natural log PC20 at follow-up visit
variable.comment: Prior to calculating the log, a constant of '1' was added to the PC20 value.

variable.name: prefev
variable.description: FEV1 at follow-up visit

variable.name: prefvc
variable.description: FVC at follow-up visit

variable.name: preff
variable.description: FEV1/FVC ratio at follow-up visit

variable.name: prefevpp
variable.description: FEV1 percent predicted at follow-up visit

variable.name: prefvcpp
variable.description: FVC percent predicted at follow-up visit

variable.name: posfev
variable.description: Post-FEV1 at follow-up visit

variable.name: posfvc
variable.description: Post-FVC at follow-up visit

variable.name: posff
variable.description: Post-FEV1/FVC ratio at follow-up visit

variable.name: posfevpp
variable.description: Post-FEV1 percent predicted at follow-up visit

variable.name: posfvcpp
variable.description: Post-FVC percent predicted at follow-up visit

variable.name: bdrabpct
variable.description: Bronchodilator percent change. The calculation is: (POSFEV - PREFEV)/PREFEV.

variable.name: eos
variable.description: Blood eosinophils at follow-up visit

variable.name: log10eos
variable.description: Log10 blood eosinophils at follow-up visit
variable.comment: Prior to calculating the log, a constant of '1' was added to the EOS value.

variable.name: ige
variable.description: Total IgE at follow-up visit

variable.name: log10ige
variable.description: Log10 IgE at follow-up visit
variable.comment: Prior to calculating the log, a constant of '1' was added to the IgE value.

variable.name: ampf
variable.description: Average AM peak flow (L/min) as recorded in daily diary card since last visit

variable.name: totres
variable.description: Average total rescue use per day as recorded in daily diary card since last visit

variable.name: amsym
variable.description: Average AM symptoms as recorded in daily diary card since last visit

variable.name: pos_skintest
variable.description: One or more positive skin test at follow-up visit

variable.name: nall_skintest
variable.description: Number of skin tests (all tests) at follow-up visit

variable.name: npos_skintest
variable.description: Number of pos skin tests (all tests) at follow-up visit

variable.name: n_core_skintest
variable.description: Number of core skin tests at follow-up visit

variable.name: npos_core_skintest
variable.description: Number of core positive skin tests at follow-up visit
